thread.section_title: Espressorium Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Espressorium | www.espressorium.com.au
thread.title: Maree Mercer

author: Maree Mercer
title: Maree Mercer
text: I recently made my first purchase of Dingo Republic capsules to use in my Lattissima Pro. They work perfectly. I purchased the Taste Pack to try the different varieties and so far I've tried the Columbia and the Mexico Organic Decaf. The Columbia is the nicest coffee I have ever tasted and I'm about to order more. Shipping was quick and the packaging is pretty. I'm very happy I decided to try this Nespresso alternative and can recommend them.
